examples: Her presence instilled faith into the children
transfuse love of music into the students

definitions.text: produce or try to produce a vivid impression of
examples: Mother tried to ingrain respect for our elders in us

definitions.text: teach and impress by frequent repetitions or admonitions
examples: inculcate values into the young generation

definitions.text: fill, as with a certain quality
examples: The heavy traffic tinctures the air with carbon monoxide
